snippet: On Friday, Mitt Romney had his best day in state-level polling since at least the party conventions, something that very probably reflects improvement in his standing following the debate on Wednesday.
abstract: On Friday, Mitt Romney had his best day in state-level polling since at least the party conventions, something that very probably reflects improvement in his standing following the debate on Wednesday.

headline.main: Oct. 5: Day After Debate, Strong Swing State Polls for Romney
